title: Social distancing: what to do and what not to do to curb spread of COVID-19 - paNOW
description: Social distancing: what to do and what not to do to curb spread of COVID-19 paNOW EDITORIAL: Defeating COVID-19 will take months Toronto Sun Social Distancing – COVID-19: What You Need To Know ABC These Graphics Help Explain Why Social Distancing Is Critical …
content: Go to the grocery store or pharmacy as needed but keep the two metre distance and wash your hands upon your return home Shopping online and arranging to have things dropped off at your home is even better Wash your hands often with soap and water for at l chars
